function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Scarce personnel to monitor compliance with protocols","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to lack of enforcement","Mitigation":"Increase personnel, use technology for monitoring, and enforce stricter penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Monitoring systems, surveillance cameras, and enforcement apps","People":"Residents, visitors, and park-goers","Owner":"Local government, municipal authorities, and law enforcement"},{"Description":"Non-compliance with curfew measures and park restrictions","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to unauthorized gatherings and lack of social distancing","Mitigation":"Increase enforcement, community engagement, and communication campaigns to educate and inform about the risks","Technologies":"Communication tools, public awareness campaigns, and community engagement platforms","People":"Residents, young people, and individuals visiting the parks","Owner":"Local government, community leaders, and law enforcement"},{"Description":"Demand for park access leading to non-compliance with safety measures","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to overcrowding and lack of adherence to safety protocols","Mitigation":"Gradual reopening with strict capacity limits, continuous communication about safety measures, and increased monitoring and enforcement","Technologies":"Ticketing systems, crowd monitoring technologies, and communication platforms","People":"Residents, park-goers, and visitors","Owner":"Local government, park authorities, and law enforcement"}]}
